text: Yanna tara manapasuna vatate ki, jase te kaphira aheta tase tumhihi tyancyasarakhe imanaca inkara karu lagave ani tumhi sarva ekasamana vhave, yastava tyancyapaiki konala apala kharakhura mitra banavu naka, joparyanta te allahacya margata hijarata (desa-tyaga) karita nahita. Maga jara (yapasuna) tonda phiravatila tara tyanna dhara ani thara kara, jithedekhila adhalatila. Khabaradara! Tyancyapaiki konalahi apala mitra ani sahayyaka samajuna ghe'u naka
